banner.title: Delicious Cakes for Every Occasion
banner.description: Handcrafted with love, our cakes bring joy to your special moments. From birthdays to weddings, we create edible masterpieces.

featuredSection.title: Our Featured Cakes
featuredSection.description: Discover our most loved cakes, handcrafted with the finest ingredients for your special moments.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.description: At Sweet Delights, we pride ourselves on quality, flavor, and artistry.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: We use only the finest ingredients, ensuring every bite is a delight.

design.title: Custom Designs
design.description: From concept to creation, we bring your cake vision to life.

delivery.title: On-Time Delivery
delivery.description: We value your time and ensure your cake is delivered fresh and on schedule.

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.description: Have questions about our cakes or want to place a custom order? Our team is here to help. Reach out to us using any of the methods below.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you shortly.

email.label: Email Address *
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

phone.invalid: Please enter a valid phone number

message.label: Message *
message.tooShort: Message must be at least 10 characters long

hero.title: Our Story
hero.description: Sweet Delights is a family-owned bakery dedicated to creating beautiful, delicious cakes for all of life's special moments.

history.title: Our Beginning
history.paragraph1: Sweet Delights was established in 2005 by pastry chef Emma Johnson. What began as a small home bakery quickly grew into a beloved local institution, as word spread about our exceptional cakes and pastries.
history.paragraph2: Over the years, we've expanded our team and offerings, but our commitment to quality has never wavered. We still make everything from scratch, using the finest ingredients and time-honored techniques.
history.paragraph3: Today, Sweet Delights is proud to be the bakery of choice for countless celebrations throughout the region, from intimate birthday parties to grand weddings and corporate events.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We never compromise on ingredients or techniques. Every cake is made with premium ingredients and careful attention to detail.

service.title: Personalized Service
service.description: We believe each celebration is unique. Our team works closely with you to create the perfect cake for your special occasion.

taste.title: Exceptional Taste
taste.description: A beautiful cake should taste even better than it looks. We pride ourselves on creating cakes that are as delicious as they are beautiful.

emma.name: Emma Johnson
emma.description: Trained in Paris, Emma brings 15 years of pastry expertise to every creation.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.description: A master of intricate designs, Michael specializes in wedding and celebration cakes.

sophia.name: Sophia Rodriguez
sophia.description: With an art background, Sophia creates our most stunning decorative elements.

james.name: James Wilson
james.description: James ensures every client receives personalized attention throughout the ordering process.

cta.title: Ready to order your custom cake?
cta.description: Whether you're planning a wedding, birthday, or special event, we'd love to create the perfect cake for your celebration.

about.description: Crafting delicious memories since 2005. Our passion is creating the perfect cake for your special moments.
